Box.Shared.Description:
Beware of creatures inside.
Use this trinket to open an inventory ({{Capacity}} slots), trinkets placed inside will be equipped.
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.name: Early Trinket Slot
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.description: Enable trinket slot early, which also make trinkets drop from monsters early. This option takes 1 save/load to change.
